documentType: FBI Office of Public Affairs internal newsletter
summary: This is an FBI Office of Public Affairs internal newsletter dated March 14, 2019, summarizing media-related activities and inquiries across various FBI field offices. It includes a notable entry where the Miami field office declined to comment on a CBS Evening News request for video from a 2009 search warrant of Jeffrey Epstein's house.

keyFacts: The Miami FBI field office declined to comment on a CBS Evening News request for video from a 2009 search warrant of Jeffrey Epstein's house.
The document is an internal FBI Office of Public Affairs newsletter dated March 14, 2019, showing routine media monitoring and response activities.
The Boston field office was receiving extensive media interest in Operation Varsity Blues, the college admissions bribery scandal.
FBI Director Christopher Wray made a visit to the National 9/11 Memorial & Museum a required part of training for new agents and analysts.
The New Orleans field office was investigating potential federal violations by a sheriff who transported an incarcerated sex offender to his home for labor.
